name: Museum Escape
description:
You have awoken in a museum in the middle of the day, and it seems you fell asleep there last night - now the guards think you're trying to steal its valuables! Escape the museum whilst avoiding enemies!

Controls:

  • Left Stick to Move
  • Right Stick to Look Around
  • Start to Pause game (from here, you can access the Menu with the Right Bumper, and Exit Game with the Left Bumper)
  • From Menu, press: X to go to Level 1, Y to go to Level 2, and B to go to Level 3

(Please note: the buckets seen on each level have no function but can be picked up, and after selecting a level from the menu, press Start again to move.)
